name: liascript
author: Andr√© Dietrich
description: An extended Markdown interpreter for the creation of interactive online courses.

scripts.init:app: npm run init && npm run cp
scripts.cp: npm run cp:static && npm run cp:ace && npm run cp:katex
scripts.build:app: npm run init:app && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/app/index.html && npm run sw
scripts.watch:app: npm run init:app && npx parcel serve src/entry/app/index.html --open
scripts.watch:base: npm run init:app && npx parcel serve src/entry/base/index.html
scripts.build:base: npm run init:app && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/base/index.html
scripts.build:dev: npm run init:app && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/dev/index.html && npm run sw
scripts.watch:dev: npm run init:app && npx parcel serve src/entry/dev/index.html --open
scripts.build:scorm1.2: npm run init:app && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url ./ src/entry/scorm1.2/index.html
scripts.watch:scorm1.2: npm run init:app && npx parcel serve src/entry/scorm1.2/index.html
scripts.build:worker: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --target node --public-url ./ src/entry/worker/index.js
scripts.watch:webcomponent: npm run init && npx parcel serve src/entry/webcomponent/index.html --open
scripts.build:webcomponent: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps src/entry/webcomponent/index.ts && rm dist/README.md
scripts.build:webcomponentPublic: npm run init && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url https://liascript.github.io/webcomponent/ src/entry/webcomponent/index.ts && rm dist/README.md
